user_query: fucking and they look like a couple of cracked out meth bitches and then they lead him all the way to this abandoned torn down fucking rubbled filled building and they're like yeah the art show's in there go walk down that long dark hallway you'll see Josh in there have fun what the fuck dude how many red flags do you need bro the only thing missing from that scenario is a big ass sign like with neon saying torture this way and situations like that always take me out of a movie I can be forgiving of minor things or minor stupid decisions because as we all can acknowledge when your adrenaline is up when you're worried when you're you know out of your element as far as being in a horrific situation your brain doesn't always function the same way you can make stupid decisions you can not think clearly but that was like 20 straight minutes of just like dude get the fuck out of there you know better what are you doing those are the moments that pull me out of a movie because I'm reminded that somebody is writing all of this and I don't believe anybody no matter how loyal of a friend they are would ever be in that situation and even though I enjoy this because after you go through the depraved second and third act and seeing all this torture and murder and pain I really look forward to the side of the movie where Paxton starts to get his revenge and all these people that fucked him over and set up his friend and got them killed are starting to get their comeuppance there's a lot

entities.entity_description: Paxton은 영화의 주인공으로, 친구들과 함께 위험한 상황에 빠지지만 후반부에서 복수를 시작하는 인물이다
Josh는 Paxton의 친구로, 버려진 건물 안에 있다고 언급되며 결국 죽임을 당하는 것으로 보이는 인물이다

relationships.relationship_description: Paxton과 Josh는 친구 사이이며, Josh가 함정에 빠져 죽임을 당한 후 Paxton이 복수를 시작한다
